list.abs: ...小伞花繁缕（学名：Stellaria parvi-umbellata）为石竹科繁缕属的植物，是中国的特有植物。分布在中国大陆的宁夏、新疆、青海、甘肃、陕西等地，生长于海拔2,900米的地区，常生长在山谷洼地，目前尚未由人工引种栽培。== 参考文献 ==<div class=“ref.
...小卵叶连蕊茶（学名：Camellia parvi-ovata）是山茶科山茶属的植物。分布在中国大陆的四川等地，目前尚未由人工引种栽培。== 参考文献 ==* cite web | url = http://www.bioinfo.cn.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, based on late paradisus 'paradise', in the Middle Ages denoting a court in front of St Peter's, Rome

means.word_mean: 1. a courtyard or portico in front of a building (especially a cathedral)

auth_sentence.content: I went up the steps to the splendidly illuminated parvis.
auth_sentence.res_content: I went up the steps to the splendidly illuminated parvis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I went up the steps to the splendidly illuminated parvis.
